name: qa-automation-framework
description: Portfolio-grade QA automation framework with Playwright, k6, Docker, and CI quality gates

scripts.test:local: npm run docker:up && npm run test:ci
scripts.perf:smoke: docker compose --profile perf run --rm k6 sh -lc 'mkdir -p /work/perf/results && K6_WEB_DASHBOARD=true K6_WEB_DASHBOARD_EXPORT=/work/perf/results/smoke.html k6 run --out json=/work/perf/results/smoke.json /work/perf/smoke.js'
scripts.perf:load: docker compose --profile perf run --rm k6 sh -lc 'mkdir -p /work/perf/results && K6_WEB_DASHBOARD=true K6_WEB_DASHBOARD_EXPORT=/work/perf/results/load.html k6 run --out json=/work/perf/results/load.json /work/perf/load.js'
scripts.perf:stress: docker compose --profile perf run --rm k6 sh -lc 'mkdir -p /work/perf/results && K6_WEB_DASHBOARD=true K6_WEB_DASHBOARD_EXPORT=/work/perf/results/stress.html k6 run --out json=/work/perf/results/stress.json /work/perf/stress.js'
